definition: to take or assume for one's own use
details:
verb
- to take or assume for one's own use
= example: to take or assume for one's own use
- to appoint summarily or commandeer
= example: to appoint summarily or commandeer
- to choose or elect as a fellow member or colleague
= example: to choose or elect as a fellow member or colleague
- to neutralize or win over through assimilation into an established group
= example: to neutralize or win over through assimilation into an established group
